--- layout: datasheet ---

TrafficGuard Management Instrument

Overview

There are several ways of integrating TrafficGuard as a SensorFleet intrument. There is a choice between reusability and speed of integration.

It was decided 2018-12-18 that we will implement whatever integration is the easiest to do, with the argument that this is a good integration test for SensorFleet.

If integration of such software proves to be too difficult, we might need to reconsider some of our design strategies.

PortDiff instrument properties

Instrument developer F-Solutions Oy
Categories Integrity Monitoring, Asset Tracking
Network access type None
Required interfaces None
Instrument dependencies None
Data retention None
Management UI Yes
Performance None
